SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b JOIN ( SELECT board_id FROM board_tag WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY board_id ) bt ON bt.board_id = b.id WHERE b.is_use = 1 AND b.is_delete = 0 AND organization_code = #{orgCode} AND board_category = 'BO002'

SELECT b.id , b.title , b.sub_title , b.content , DATE_FORMAT(b.create_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') AS create_datetime , ( SELECT CONCAT(f.name, f.type) FROM file f WHERE b.title_img = f.id ) AS title_img , ( SELECT CONCAT(f.name, f.type) FROM file f WHERE b.thumbnail_img = f.id ) AS thumbnail_img FROM board b JOIN ( SELECT board_id FROM board_tag WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY board_id ) bt ON bt.board_id = b.id WHERE b.is_use = 1 AND b.is_delete = 0 AND organization_code = #{orgCode} AND board_category = 'BO002' ORDER BY create_datetime DESC , update_datetime DESC LIMIT #{startPost}, #{postCnt}

SELECT b.title , b.sub_title , b.content , ( SELECT CONCAT(f.name, f.type) FROM file f WHERE b.title_img = f.id ) AS title_img , ( SELECT CONCAT(f.name, f.type) FROM file f WHERE b.thumbnail_img = f.id ) AS thumbnail_img FROM board b WHERE b.id = #{blogId}
SELECT t.tag_name AS tagName , t.tag_color AS tagColor FROM board_tag bt LEFT JOIN tag t ON t.tag_id = bt.tag_id WHERE bt.board_id = #{id}
